resources.string: To take and send photos, grant permission to acces the camera
BY CONTINUING YOU AGREE TO _TERMS OF USE_.

HI %1$s, 

 WIRE IS SO MUCH NICER

YOUR NUMBER IS OPTIONAL, BUT IT MAKES IT EASIER FOR US TO FIND PEOPLE YOU KNOW. TO MAKE SURE IT\'S YOU, WE\'LL SEND A CONFIRMATION CODE VIA SMS.
ENTER THE 3-DIGIT CONFIRMATION CODE FROM THE SMS.
This helps us find people you may know.

This lets you use Wire on multiple devices.

resources.string: You must be online to add people. We will try again when you are back online.
You must be online to create a conversation. The other people will see your changes when you are back online.
You won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to send or receive messages in this conversation.
%1$s won\'t be able to find or contact you on Wire.
This will clear the conversation history and remove it from the list.
Add people or share a link to this conversation.
People can find you with these details. The information is encrypted and not visible to anyone else.
We will send an email to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
We will send a SMS to:\n[[%1$s]]\nFollow the link to permanently delete your account.
Are you sure you want to log out?
This helps you connect with others. We anonymize all the information and do not share it with anyone else.
Replace message text with animated GIFs.
You need a Spotify Premium account.
If you don\'t recognize a device above, remove it and reset your password in Settings > Account.
Wire gives every device a unique fingerprint. Compare fingerprints to verify your devices and conversations.
If fingerprints don’t match, reset your secure session to make sure that the correct fingerprints are shown on all devices.
You will be automatically logged out of that device.
This helps Wire Support diagnose problems.
Make Wire better by sending anonymous information.
Help us troubleshoot! Please tell us details of what happened, what error message you received or screenshot, and if possible the steps to reproduce the issue.\n\n
Enter the verification code we sent to %s
Check your email inbox and follow the instructions.
We will send a notification code to:\n%s

Wire is so much nicer with a picture.
You must be online to rename a conversation. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to resend a message. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to leave the conversation. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to remove people from conversations. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to call. Check your connection and try again.
You must be online to change your picture. Check your connection and try again.
